name: Pscyhometric Assessments
description: Pscyhometric Tests include Aptitude, Skills or Personality measurement cognitive ability and agility. Frequently, Psychometric Tests equal Aptitude Tests + Personality Tests

name: Aptitude Assessments
description: Aptitude or Reasoning Tests quantify innate human ability or competence, e.g., numerical, mechanical, logical, verbal or abstract reasoing skills, often for education or employment objectives.

name: Creativity Assessments
description: Creativity Assessments test ability to think and act in an original, unique or novel way, mostly at work to design products or services and/or solve problems and cover human personality, motives, temperament, environment and problem-solving skills.

name: Leadership Assessments
description: Leadership Assessments test human leadership capabilities including motivations, goals, attitudes, decision-making and behavioural skills.
